summary: The diff does not contain changes to the backend canister settings (dfx.json or similar configuration file) to increase stable_memory_reserve_mb from 0 to 512 MB. While backend/main.mo shows storage-related code with blob storage functionality, there is no evidence of the configuration change that REQ-1 explicitly requires.

missing_requirements.requirement: Increase stable_memory_reserve_mb in backend canister settings from 0 to 512 MB
missing_requirements.reason: No configuration file (e.g., dfx.json, canister.json) was modified to set stable_memory_reserve_mb to 512. The diff only shows backend/main.mo and project_state.json changes, neither of which contain canister configuration settings.
